page.title: 10RECREATION IN DACRE.
page.content: The pub is called the Horse and Farrier.Inside they play darts and dominoes and sometimes play bingo.It opens at 7.00 pm. and closes at 11.30.pm.At the Village Hall in Dacre and music is played on records from the Top 40 Breakers and they have parties for special occasions like birthdays,weddings and confirmations. Village sports are held in a field down from the Village Hall.Races such as running, skipping,sack,relay and long distance,are run by the village children.Funds are raised for the support and running of the Village Hall through domino drives.It is run by community effort.Musical recitals are occasionally held at Dalemain. These are organized by Mrs.Jane Hasell McCosh for charities like the Calvert Trust,Keswick and the Eddington Centre,Penrith.
